article.title: Galaxy @ Inbix2020
article.tease: Recent advances in computational biology for codifying Biodiversity into one health approach: Biodiversity, Climate change, One health and Zoonotic diseases

article.content:
Galaxy will be a part of several presentations at Inbix2020. Want to learn more? Plan to attend these:

Date Time* Topic Presenter
Tue 1 Dec 15:00 Harnessing the Recommender Algorithms for Bioinformatics and Medicine: Applications and Challenges Harshita Bhargava and Amita Sharma
Fri 4 Dec 11:45 Workflows for Genomic Variant Discovery Ambarish Kumar
Sat 5 Dec 10:45 Deep Learning based study on Drugs Targeted Neurological Disorders Mehak Chopra and Rajul Jain

* Times are all India time.
